name: FnF HD
description:
Credit https://pizzashowerman.itch.io/funkin-hd

The maker of this mod has full permission to take this page down.

REMINDER: Don’t turn note glow on. It will mess up the notes and break the game. This is a part of the FPS Plus engine. If notes don’t work, turn off the note glow in options.

Smokey555 for FnF HD

Rozebud for the engine, FpsPlus

Ninjamuffin99, PhantomArcade, evilsk8r and KawaiSprite for Friday Night Funkin'

KadeDev for base engine

Changelog:

Blammed crashing fixed partially, however the near last warning note crashes the game.
